query.statement:
SELECT L2.MANDT AS MANDT , L2.ZKNUM AS ZKNUM , L2.ZKNUM2 AS ZKNUM2 , L2.ZTON1 AS ZTON1 , L2.ZTON2 AS ZTON2 , L2.ZTON3 AS ZTON3 , L2.ZTON4 AS ZTON4 , L2.ZTON5 AS ZTON5 , L2.ZTON6 AS ZTON6 , L2.ZTON7 AS ZTON7 , L2.ZTON8 AS ZTON8 , L2.ZTON9 AS ZTON9 , L2.ZTON10 AS ZTON10 , L2.ZTON11 AS ZTON11 , L2.ZTON12 AS ZTON12 , L2.ZTON13 AS ZTON13 , L2.ZTON14 AS ZTON14 , L2.ZTON15 AS ZTON15 , L2.LIFNR AS LIFNR , L2.ZHYUN AS ZHYUN , L2.ERDAT AS ERDAT , SUBSTR(L2.ERZET,1,4) AS ERZET , L2.DPTEN AS DPTEN , SUBSTR(L2.UPTEN,1,4) AS UPTEN , L2.TPLST AS TPLST , L2.BEZEI AS BEZEI , L2.ZTEXT AS ZTEXT , L2.ERNAM AS ERNAM , L2.ZCONF AS ZCONF , L2.AEDAT AS AEDAT , L2.UZEIT AS UZEIT , L2.ZTYPE AS ZTYPE , L2.ZCANC AS ZCANC , L2.ZCHAN AS ZCHAN , L2.ZTRANS AS ZTRANS , L2.ZINDAT AS ZINDAT , L2.ZINZET AS ZINZET , L2.ZOUTDAT AS ZOUTDAT , L2.ZOUTZET AS ZOUTZET , L2.AENAM AS AENAM , L2.LAEDA AS LAEDA , L2.CHANGE_TIME AS CHANGE_TIME , L5.NAME1 AS NAME1 , L5.ZHYUT AS ZHYUT -- , VALUE(TZONT.VTEXT, '') AS ZLZONE_NM , T3.ZLZONE AS ZLZONE , L2.ZTRCOST AS ZTRCOST , L2.ZFULLSET AS ZFULLSET , L2.ZFULLSET2 AS ZFULLSET2 ,L2.TPLSTDT1 ,L2.TPLSTDT2 ,L2.TPLSTDT3 ,L2.TPLSTDT4 ,L2.TPLSTDT5 ,L2.TPLSTDTQTY1 ,L2.TPLSTDTQTY2 ,L2.TPLSTDTQTY3 ,L2.TPLSTDTQTY4 ,L2.TPLSTDTQTY5 ,L2.TPLSTDTZTON1 ,L2.TPLSTDTZTON2 ,L2.TPLSTDTZTON3 ,L2.TPLSTDTZTON4 ,L2.TPLSTDTZTON5 ,L2.TPLSTDT6 ,L2.TPLSTDT7 ,L2.TPLSTDTQTY6 ,L2.TPLSTDTQTY7 ,L2.TPLSTDTZTON6 ,L2.TPLSTDTZTON7 ,L2.CHNGCONFIRM , '' AS NEWZKNUM FROM SAPHEE.ZLET002 AS L2 -- LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M12 ON L2.MANDT = M12.MANDT -- AND L2.LIFNR = M12.LIFNR INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET003 AS T3 ON L2.MANDT = T3.MANDT AND L2.ZKNUM = T3.ZKNUM AND L2.ZKNUM2 = T3.ZKNUM2 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLET005 AS L5 ON L2.MANDT = L5.MANDT AND L2.LIFNR = L5.LIFNR AND L2.ZHYUN = L5.ZHYUN -- LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.TZONT AS TZONT ON TZONT.MANDT = T3.MANDT -- AND TZONT.SPRAS = '3' -- AND TZONT.LAND1 = 'KR' -- AND TZONT.ZONE1 = T3.ZLZONE
WHERE L2.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND L2.ZKNUM = #ZKNUM#
AND L2.ZKNUM2 = #ZKNUM2#
FETCH FIRST ROWS ONLY WITH UR
